messages.messageBody:
No he can't be...just can't be messing with his fundoshi.
Maybe it's just my dirty mind....MAYBE.

Actually the first thing I saw in this image was this man's kamon (on
the right)

http://1happyturtle.com/temporary/fundoshi.gif

this comes from Fujita Goro's obsession with washing his undies,
starching them and hanging them out to dry...DAILY.
